name: Invoice query report
query:
select `tabPurchase Invoice`.name as "name:Link/Purchase Invoice:150",
`tabPurchase Invoice`.posting_date,
`tabPurchase Invoice`.company,
`tabPurchase Invoice`.supplier,
`tabPurchase Invoice`.total,
GROUP_CONCAT(`tabPurchase Invoice Item`.item_code) as code,
`tabPurchase Invoice Item`.item_name,
`tabSupplier`.supplier_type
from `tabPurchase Invoice`  
join
`tabPurchase Invoice Item` 
on 
`tabPurchase Invoice`.name=`tabPurchase Invoice Item`.parent
 join 
`tabSupplier`
on 
`tabSupplier`.name=`tabPurchase Invoice`.supplier_name
where `tabPurchase Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s 
group by 
`tabPurchase Invoice Item`.parent
